titleStmt.title: John Boyle to A. F. Joseph
CWG13902

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p:
126
April 27th 4
Dr A. F. Joseph
Cincinnati. O
Sir

Your communication of the 18th inst addressed to the Governor has been referred to me for reply. I have the honor to state that comissions to surgeons in Kentucky regiments are only issued upon the recomendation of the officers commanding them. At present there are no vacancies in our regiments.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky.
